content:
Test and document data source connection in Sisense
---------------------------------------------------

Hello Engineering team,

We would like to request that you test and document the process for connecting a data source in Sisense.

Please include the following information in your documentation:

* The type of data source you are connecting (e.g. MySQL database, CSV file, etc.)
* The steps required to set up the connection
* Any potential issues or error messages that may occur, and how to troubleshoot them
* Any relevant configuration or settings that need to be considered

Thank you for your help in making it easy for our team to connect and work with data sources in Sisense.

Best, [Your Name]
